p: Gardini et al. [ 37] posited that hexanal is not soluble in water and therefore in the culture medium. However, Almenar et al. [ 14] showed that PDA medium absorbed hexanal and prevented A. alternata and C. acutatum growth (3.0 and 3.3 Î¼L respectively). Therefore, if media can absorb henxanal, we hypothesize that fresh produce can also absorb small amounts of volatiles and extend their shelf life by extruding it.
